sentences.en: a map with our property outlined in red
sentences.cn: 用红色勾画出我们住宅轮廓的地图

sentences.en: a research proposal outline
sentences.cn: 研究计划梗概

sentences.en: an outline map of Europe
sentences.cn: 欧洲略图

sentences.en: an outline of world history
sentences.cn: 世界史纲

sentences.en: Draw an outline before you fill in the details.
sentences.cn: 先画个轮廓,再画细部.

sentences.en: Draw your child's outline with a heavy black marker.
sentences.cn: 用浓黑色的毡笔画出你孩子的轮廓。

sentences.en: First make an outline, and then fill in the content.
sentences.cn: 先搭好架子, 再充实内容.

sentences.en: Following is an outline of the survey findings.
sentences.cn: 以下是调查结果概要。

sentences.en: He could see only the hazy outline of the goalposts.
sentences.cn: 他只能看见球门柱模糊的轮廓。

sentences.en: He presented his idea in outline at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 他在会议上扼要地说明自己的想法.

sentences.en: Here we outline some of the some-times conflicting forces moulding the debate.
sentences.cn: 在此我们概述一些有时影响争论的相互对立的力量。

sentences.en: It may be briefly summarized in the following outline.
sentences.cn: 这可以用下面的提纲简短地加以概括.

sentences.en: Make an outline before trying to write a composition.
sentences.cn: 写作文之前先写个提纲.

sentences.en: Mist shrouded the outline of Buckingham Palace.
sentences.cn: 雾霭蒙蒙，白金汉宫若隐若现。

sentences.en: Night fell, but the outline of the factory buildings was still discernible.
sentences.cn: 夜幕降临了, 但厂房还能看见个轮廓.

sentences.en: Smudge the outline using a cotton-wool bud.
sentences.cn: 用一根棉签把轮廓抹花。

sentences.en: The mayor outlined his plan to clean up the town's image.
sentences.cn: 市长概述了他清理整顿该市形象的计划。

sentences.en: The new president outlined plans to deal with crime, drugs, and education.
sentences.cn: 新总统概述了解决犯罪、毒品和教育问题的计划。

sentences.en: The outline of Italy suggests a boot.
sentences.cn: 意大利的轮廓像只长统靴.

sentences.en: The outline of the mountain in the distance is dim.
sentences.cn: 远处山脉的轮廓隐隐约约.

sentences.en: the plan has been agreed in outline.
sentences.cn: 该计划总体上已达成一致看法。

sentences.en: trees outlined against the sky
sentences.cn: 天空映衬下的树木轮廓

sentences.en: With a lip pencil, outline lips and fill them in.
sentences.cn: 用唇线笔勾出双唇的轮廓，然后涂上唇膏。

trans.tran_cn: 梗概，大纲，提纲，草稿，要点，主要原则，外形，轮廓，轮廓线，轮廓画法，略图（画法）
trans.tran_en: the main ideas or facts about something, without the details
to describe something in a general way, giving the main points but not the details

trans.tran_cn: 概述，略述，画轮廓，打草图，描略图
trans.tran_en: to show the edge of something, or draw around its edge, so that its shape is clear
